result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Donta L. Jenkins

10:10 AM cases 22CF696, 22CF1006, 22CM196 called. Prosecuting attorney Andrew James Gunderson in court for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant Donta L. Jenkins in court, in custody.  Attorney Kate Cook appears on behalf of Attorney Ryan Joseph Raymond. 

Cases have been rescheduled to 11/22/2022 at 9:30 AM

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt: SPD Appointment - Attorney Ryan Raymond

Hearing on October 27, 2022 at 09:30 am.

*Not mailed, defendant's address listed as 'Homeless'.*

(Cases 22CF696, 22CF1006, 22CM196 are called at 1:44 PM) Defendant Donta L. Jenkins in court, in custody with Attorney Ryan Raymond (who appears specially).  Attorney Afton Lewis in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Defense indicates the Defendant is eligible for Public Defender representation, however none has yet been appointed since Attorney Petersen's withdrawal. Attorney Raymond indicates he will appoint himself to these cases and requests these cases be scheduled for a return hearing. 
22CF1006- Defense waives reading of the complaint. Time limits for preliminary hearing waived. 
Hearing: 10/27/2022 at 9:30 AM.
Competency concerns by former defense attorney not addressed.
It is ordered that Attorney Melissa Petersen is withdrawn as counsel.

9:29 AM Cases called: 22CF696 and 22CM196. Defendant Donta L. Jenkins appeared by video, in custody from the Eau Claire County Jail.  Attorney Melissa M. Petersen in court for Donta L. Jenkins. Prosecuting attorney Afton Brianna Lewis Ms. in court for the State of Wisconsin. 

Defense is waiting on an offer in this case. There is a revocation in another case the defendant has. Defense request a preliminary hearing on the felony file. 22CM196 will ride along.
Preliminary hearing scheduled for October 11, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Preliminary hearing on October 11, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
